overview.en: XTS Chain, a blockchain-based film and television investment copyright trading platform, is a public Chain that provides financial services and resource allocation for the pan-entertainment sector, realizes the optimal allocation of pan-entertainment market elements, promotes industrial development, and reshapes industrial rules. XTS relies on the underlying technology of block Chain to build the industrial ecology, and naturally has the gene of open platform, which is open to all people, and establishes the governance structure of XTS Chain foundation based on the principles of democracy, openness and equality.
overview.zh: XTS Chain基于区块链的影视投资版权交易平台，是为泛娱乐领域提供金融服务和资源配置的公有链，实现泛娱乐要素市场的优化配置，促进产业发展，重塑行业规则。XTS依托区块链底层技术搭建产业生态，天然具备开放平台的基因，面向所有人开放，并基于民主、公开、平等的原则建立了XTS Chain基金会的治理架构。
